Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI was grammerly - I trust this for editing and making sure I conform to referencing guidelines. The teacher provides feedback moreso on CONTENT rather than style, which AI can't do (or I don't use it for this)

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: I can ask Grammerly for non-stop feedback and don't feel bad, whereas a teacher only provides feedback once the assignment is submitted (my course is online)
